amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Air National Guard by $24 million to purchase modular aircraft firefighting systems (MAFF's).
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for the Air National Guard to purchase modular aircraft firefighting systems.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gallegly amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gallegly amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Gallegly.
